description: This file defines a React functional component 'Sidebar' which renders a sidebar navigation menu for a recipe manager web application. It includes links to 'Recipes' and 'Favorites', a theme toggle button, and user authentication related buttons (sign in/register or log out).

methods.name: Sidebar({ onThemeToggle, theme, onAuth, onLogout, isLoggedIn, openSubmitModal, })
methods.description: React functional component that renders the sidebar UI with navigation links, theme toggle, and authentication controls.

ctags.name: Sidebar
ctags.signature: ({ onThemeToggle, theme, onAuth, onLogout, isLoggedIn, openSubmitModal, })
